dom: <input class="input-field" data-bind="value: first_name, validate: 'value'" id="shipping-first-name-box" maxlength="50" name="first_name" type="text"/>

dom: <input class="input-field" data-bind="value: last_name, validate: 'value'" id="shipping-last-name-box" maxlength="50" name="last_name" type="text"/>

dom: <input class="input-field" data-bind="value: address1, validate: 'value'" id="shipping-address-1" maxlength="50" name="address1" type="text"/>

dom: <input class="input-field" data-bind="value: address2" id="shipping-address-2" maxlength="50" name="address2" type="text"/>

dom: <input aria-required="true" class="input-field" data-bind="value: city, validate: 'value'" data-di-unmask-field="" data-errordescription="shipping-city-error" id="shipping-city" maxlength="50" name="city" type="text"/>
feature: required city text shipping city city 50

dom: <input aria-required="true" class="input-field" data-bind="value: postal_code, validate: 'value'" data-di-unmask-field="" data-errordescription="shipping-postal_code-error" id="ship-zip" name="postal_code" type="text"/>
feature: provide your zip for city state text ship zip postal code

feature: required email text email shipping c emailaddress 50

dom: <input class="read-only hide-optional" data-bind="css: {expired: $data.isexpired && $data.isexpired()}, value: month() + '/' + yearreadonly()" disabled="" id="exp_date-in-page" name="expirationdate" type="text"/>
feature: expires exp date in page expirationdate text

dom: <input class="read-only" data-bind="value: owner, validate: 'value', attr: { 'disabled': !isaddcreditcardform(), 'required': isaddcreditcardform() }, css: { 'hide-optional': !isaddcreditcardform() }" id="owner-in-page" type="text"/>

dom: <input aria-describedby="promotions-coupon-status" aria-labelledby="coupon-code-label" class="coupon-code" data-bind="value: couponcode, attr: {'aria-invalid': $root.ariaisinvalidpromo()}" data-di-unmask-field="" name="coupon_code" type="text"/>

dom: <input aria-describedby="new-acct-pw-tooltip" class="" data-bind="value: $root.newuserpassword().password" data-js="password-input" id="new-acct-pw" name="pass" type="password"/>
feature: must have 8 or more characters both upper lower case letters at least 1 number not met needs 8 or more characters needs needs both upper lower case letters needs needs at least 1 number needs password strength not met not met password pass new acct pw

dom: <input class="input-field" data-bind="value: phone, validate: 'value'" id="phone-shipping" name="phone" type="tel"/>
feature: required phone number tel phone shipping phone

dom: <input autocomplete="off" class="reward-cert-input" data-bind="value: $root.rcp1rcc, valueupdate: ['afterkeydown', 'input'], handleariainvalid: {value: 'value', describedby: 'reward-cert-error', hasvalidated: $root.rewardcertsubmitattempted()}" id="reward-cert-creditcard-number" maxlength="16" name="pin" type="tel"/>
feature: pier 1 rewards credit card number tel reward cert creditcard number pin 16

dom: <input autocomplete="off" class="reward-cert-input" data-bind="value: $data.number, handleariainvalid: {value: 'value', describedby: 'reward-cert-error', hasvalidated: $root.rewardcertsubmitattempted()}" id="reward-cert-number" maxlength="12" name="number" type="tel"/>
feature: rewards certificate tel reward cert number number 12

dom: <input class="giftcard-input" data-bind="value: $root.gift_card_input().number, handleariainvalid: {value: 'value', describedby: 'gift-card-error', hasvalidated:  $root.giftcardsubmitattempted()}" id="gift-card-number" maxlength="19" name="number" type="tel"/>
feature: gift card number tel gift card number number 19

dom: <input class="giftcard-input" data-bind="value: $root.gift_card_input().pin, handleariainvalid: {value: 'value', describedby: 'gift-card-error', hasvalidated: $root.giftcardsubmitattempted()}" id="gift-card-pin" maxlength="8" name="pin" type="tel"/>
feature: pin tel gift card pin pin 8

dom: <input autocomplete="off" class="cvn-input input-field" data-bind="validate: 'value', value: $data.cvn, attr: { id:'cvn' + $index(), maxlength: $data.maxcvnlength }" name="cvn" required="" type="tel"/>
feature: verify cvv tel cvn

dom: <input autocomplete="off" class="confirmation-input input-field" data-bind="value: $data.confirmation, validate: 'value'" id="confirmation" maxlength="16" name="confirmation" type="tel"/>
feature: please confirm your card number tel confirmation confirmation 16

dom:
<input autofocus="" class="read-only" data-bind="
									value: number, 
									validate: 'value', 
									valueupdate:['afterkeydown','input'],
									event: { blur: $root.creditcardblur }, 
									attr: { 'disabled': !isaddcreditcardform(), 
									required: isaddcreditcardform() },
									errorcontainer: 'card-number-error-container-in-page',
									css: { 'hide-optional': !isaddcreditcardform() }
									" id="credit_card_number-in-page" maxlength="16" name="number" type="tel"/>
feature: card number credit card number in page number tel 16

dom: <input autocomplete="off" autofocus="" data-bind="value: cvn, validate: 'value', attr: {'maxlength': maxcvnlength}" id="cvv-in-page" required="" type="tel"/>
feature: cvv cvv in page tel

dom: <input data-bind="value: phone, validate: 'value'" id="phone-in-page" required="" type="tel"/>
feature: phone number phone in page tel

dom: <input aria-label="quantity" aria-required="true" data-bind="visible: showexpandedqtyinput, value: quantity, attr: {id: 'qty-' + product_id(), 'aria-describedby': 'qty-' + product_id() + '_errormessage', 'aria-invalid': ariaisinvalidquantity()}, css: { invalid: inventoryerror, error: $data.overquantity }" data-di-unmask-field="" maxlength="3" type="tel"/>
feature: ea ea ea ea ea ea tel 3

									css: { 'hide-optional': !isaddcreditcardform() }
									" id="credit_card_number-in-modal" maxlength="16" name="number" type="tel"/>
